title: Rice with raisins and pumpkin seeds
description: This rice with raisins and pumpkins seeds makes a lovely vegetarian side dish: the rice provides carbohydrates, the pumpkin seeds are an excellent source of zinc, while the raisins add a touch of sweetness.
ingredients: A drizzle of pumpkin seed oil or walnut oil

method.Step 1: Cook the rice in a saucepan of boiling chicken or vegetable stock for 10-12 minutes, until tender, then drain.

method.Step 2: Heat a pan and dry-fry the pumpkin seeds for a couple of minutes to toast, then add a drizzle of pumpkin seed oil or walnut oil, the rice and raisins. Add the coriander, toss well to mix through, check the seasoning and serve.
